ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Dragon faction-
ygData.msgSnippet: If ya go to CS and con one of the Wyverns you should be able to tell what yer faction would be fro teh dragons =) Halyburton Bearhugger 57 Barb Shammy Legion
ygData.messageBody:
If ya go to CS and con one of the Wyverns you should be able to tell what
yer faction would be fro teh dragons =)


Halyburton Bearhugger
57 Barb Shammy
Legion of Vengeance
Saryrn

----- Original Message -----
From: "mlockridge01" <MLockridge01@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 29, 2004 3:39 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Dragon faction-


> Anyone know a relatively safe way to test dragon faction? I want to go
> to Cobalt Scar, and have killed lots of giants. However, I am not sure
> how to find a safe place to check my faction before porting in. Hate
> to pop in and die, then have trouble finding help to gather my
> carcass. I don't currently have a guild, so getting assistance is
> often a problem.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
